name: Project ZERO: The Story before Killers
name_original: Project ZERO: The Story before Killers
description:
The beginning of the series, Killers. This is the untold story of your character becoming the Killer, who you verse in Killers. This game hasn't been completed yet so I'd appreciate it if you guys wrote some feedback on a post or in the comments area.

Good Luck and enjoy your adventures in the Horror Land!
